Content:: Binette Schroeder (5 December 1939 – 5 July 2022) was a German author and illustrator.[1] Born in Hamburg, Schroeder studied typography in Munich and continued her studies in painting at the Schule für Gestaltung Basel.[2] She wrote and illustrated numerous children's books, some of which received international awards, including two awards at the Biennial of Illustration Bratislava.[3] She lived in Munich with her husband, illustrator Peter Nickl [de]. Binette Schroeder died in Gräfelfing on 5 July 2022 at the age of 82.[4]
Title: Binette Schroeder - Wikipedia
